docstring.long_description:
The description of that function is as follows:

    Compute the eigenvalues of a general matrix.

Main difference between `eigvals` and `eig`: the eigenvectors are not returned.
docstring.short_description: The EIGVALS node is based on a numpy or scipy function.

parameters.name: a
parameters.description: A complex- or real-valued matrix whose eigenvalues will be computed.
